content:
I haven't visited any museums or galleries in person, but i can tell you that many museums and galleries around the world feature works from the weimar republic period. some of the most famous museums and galleries that feature weimar republic art include:

- the museum of modern art (moma) in new york city, which has an extensive collection of expressionist art and bauhaus works.

- the tate modern in london, which has an extensive collection of modern and contemporary art, including works by surrealist and dadaist artists.

- the berlinische galerie in berlin, which is dedicated to modern art produced in berlin and features works by many weimar republic artists.

- the stedelijk museum in amsterdam, which has a large collection of modern and contemporary art, including works by expressionist and dadaist artists.

these are just a few examples of the many museums and galleries around the world that feature weimar republic art. if you have the opportunity to visit any of these institutions, i highly recommend it!
